INSERT INTO B_CustomerPublicPool( ID, ClueID, OpportunityID, CustomerID, Name, Mobile, CustomerLevel, Reason, TheFirstVisitDate, SaleUserID, SaleUserName, SaleTeamID, SaleTeamName, Creator, CreateTime) SELECT NEWID() ID, a.ClueID, a.ID OpportunityID, a.CustomerID, a.CustomerName, a.CustomerMobile, a.CustomerLevel, dbo.F_GetSaleUserName(#{UserID}) + '经理回收' , a.TheFirstVisitDate, a.SaleUserID, a.SaleUserName, c.id AS SaleTeamID, c.name AS SaleTeamName, #{UserID}, GETDATE() FROM B_Opportunity a INNER JOIN B_SalesGroupMember b ON a.SaleUserID = b.MemberID AND b.ProjectID = a.ProjectID AND b.IsDel = 0 AND b.Status = 1 INNER JOIN B_SalesGroup c ON b.ReceptionGroupID = c.ID AND c.IsDel = 0 AND c.Status = 1 WHERE a.ID IN( SELECT name FROM F_StrToTable(#{OpportunityID}) WHERE name <> '')

mapper.select: SELECT LostID , LostReason , LostTime , RecoveryID , OpportunityID , CustomerID , CustomerName , CustomerMobile , dbo.F_DictName(OpportunitySource) AS OpportunitySource , dbo.F_DictName(CustomerLevelValue) AS CustomerLevel , CONVERT(VARCHAR, FollowupCountValue) + '次' AS FollowupCount , CASE WHEN TheLatestFollowUpDateTime IS NULL THEN '无' ELSE dbo.F_FormatDateTimeForCountBefore(TheLatestFollowUpDateTime, GETDATE(), '前') END AS TheLatestFollowUpDate , AdviserID , dbo.F_GetSaleMobile(AdviserID) AdviserMobile , dbo.F_GetSaleUserName(AdviserID) AdviserName , AdviserOrgID , dbo.F_GetSaleGroupName(AdviserID, ProjectID) AS AdviserOrgName , dbo.F_GetStatusName_xkc(OpportunityStatusValue) OpportunityStatus , IsYJ , YJTime , IsCooperat FROM ( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ${ORDER} ) num FROM ( SELECT o.ProjectID , o.ID OpportunityID , o.CustomerID , o.CustomerName , o.CustomerMobile , o.OpportunitySource , o.CustomerLevel CustomerLevelValue , o.FollowupCount FollowupCountValue , ISNULL(o.TheLatestFollowUpDate, '') TheLatestFollowUpDateTime , o.SaleUserID AdviserID , dbo.F_GetSaleGroupID(o.SaleUserID, o.ProjectID) AdviserOrgID , o.Status OpportunityStatusValue , '' RecoveryCreateTime , '' RecoveryID , '' LostID , '' LostReason , '' LostTime , '' LostCreateTime , 0 IsYJ , '' YJTime , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IsCooperat FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o WHERE o.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND o.IsDel = 0 AND o.Status <> 6 AND LEN(o.SaleUserID) > 0 ) A WHERE ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ${WHERE} ) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) recordCount FROM ( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ${ORDER} ) num FROM ( SELECT o.ProjectID , o.ID OpportunityID , o.CustomerID , o.CustomerName , o.CustomerMobile , o.OpportunitySource , o.CustomerLevel CustomerLevelValue , o.FollowupCount FollowupCountValue , ISNULL(o.TheLatestFollowUpDate, '') TheLatestFollowUpDateTime , o.SaleUserID AdviserID , dbo.F_GetSaleGroupID(o.SaleUserID, o.ProjectID) AdviserOrgID , o.Status OpportunityStatusValue , '' RecoveryCreateTime , '' RecoveryID , '' LostID , '' LostReason , '' LostTime , '' LostCreateTime , 0 IsYJ , '' YJTime , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IsCooperat FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o WHERE o.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND o.IsDel = 0 AND o.Status <> 6 AND LEN(o.SaleUserID) > 0 ) A WHERE ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ${WHERE} ) t

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LostID , LostReason , LostTime , RecoveryID , OpportunityID , CustomerID , CustomerName , CustomerMobile , OpportunitySource , CustomerLevel , FollowupCount , TheLatestFollowUpDate , AdviserID , AdviserMobile , AdviserName , AdviserOrgName , OpportunityStatus , IsYJ , YJTime , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ${ORDER} ) num FROM V_CustomerXSJLList_Select WHERE ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ${WHERE} ) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize};

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_Message( ID, ProjectID, BizID, BizType, Subject, Content, Sender, SendTime, MessageType, Receiver, IsRead, IsPush, IsNeedPush, Creator, CreateTime, IsDel, Status) SELECT NEWID(), #{ProjectID}, l.LostID, 'OpportunityGiveUp', '客户丢失通知', c.Name + '(' + c.Mobile + ') 已丢失', #{UserID}, GETDATE(), 'DD81CE6E-C855-F065-DAA2-7D0C80310088', c.ReportUserID, 0, 0, 1, #{UserID}, GETDATE(), 0, 1 FROM dbo.B_Opportunity o INNER JOIN dbo.B_Clue c ON o.ClueID = c.ID INNER JOIN( SELECT OpportunityID, ID LostID FROM dbo.B_OpportunityGiveUp WHERE ID IN( SELECT name FROM F_StrToTable(#{LostID}) WHERE name <> '' ) ) l ON l.OpportunityID = o.ID WHERE c.ReportUserID <> '' AND c.ReportUserID IS NOT NULL;
